* Our school is located in a rural area, where it rains very often especially during the afternoon. Many of the hallways within the campus have no roof such as the hallways to go to the bathroom, the corridors to enter and exit the school, the ramp to enter the dining room, and the corridor to go to the warehouse. This has caused some fall accidents of our children. Many of these corridors were cracked or uneven by the tremors that occurred in the south west area.

At the moment there are areas where the water is soaked when it rains a lot where the water does not have a good drainage and is maintained for a long time, sometimes, disabling the passage.
